ing: 1 (26 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
2 cups diced, cooked chicken breast meat
des: "My aunt gave me this recipe. She is known for her chicken and noodles, and everyone thinks she makes them from scratch. This recipe is very easy and fast."
ins: In a large pot, mix the cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, chicken broth, and chicken meat. Season with onion powder, seasoning salt, and garlic powder. Bring to a boil, and stir in the noodles. Reduce heat to low, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes.
